title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 652 - Effect Of Nonpayment Of Taxes And Enforcement Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 652 - Effect Of Nonpayment Of Taxes And Enforcement Procedures

State Regulations
§ 652.1 - Effect of nonpayment of taxes
§ 652.2 - Unpaid taxes as a lien on a mortgage
§ 652.3 - Enforcement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 652

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
